passives.name: Reap
passives.effects: Basic attacks on-hit apply a Reap stack to the target, stacking infinitely and lasting for the remainder of the combat phase, and deal bonus true damage equal to {{rd|0.7s%|0.5s%}} (+ 0.1s% per target's Reap stack) of the target's maximum health. Additionally, the target is inflicted a health threshold equal to 100% of their maximum health minus the total amount of bonus damage dealt against them, lasting until the end of the round and capped at a threshold of 50% of their maximum health.

passives.name: Sow
passives.effects: Increases the attack speed gained from all sources by 25%.
